feed.title: CMCL 2025
feed.subtitle: The 2025 Cognitive Modeling and Computational Linguistics workshop.

entry.title: CMCL at NAACL
entry.content: Exciting news! We are thrilled to announce that the CMCL Workshop will take place on May 3rd alongside NAACL 2025! See you there!
entry.summary: Exciting news! We are thrilled to announce that the CMCL Workshop will take place on May 3rd alongside NAACL 2025! See you there!

entry.title: The Call for Papers is out!

link.title: The Call for Papers is out!

entry.content: The Call for Papers for CMCL 2025 is now available online at this page. It includes important dates and submission information.
